changelog: Added all transformations and logic associated with transformation rando.
Extra toggles for turning movement rando and transformation rando on or off.
Tricksy Treat, Lap 2 Portals, And More
Multiple logic changes and fixes for various levels.
Added Tricksy Treat and pumpkins, along with option toggle.

READ HERE: A toggle was added to allow you to not spoil the randomized entrances. This only works on connect, turn it on before connecting. You may then use the entrances tab to manually check off your levels. REFRESHING THE PACK DISABLES THIS AND WILL REVEAL YOUR ENTRANCES.
Added code to properly check off moves not added to the pool as being already obtained.
Pack has been created and includes all current locations in-game. Works with APWorld 1.0.1 as of right now.
For now, the tracker is a main overview of the levels. Tracking of moves, collected toppins, collected floor keys, lap portal activation, and various yaml options are all included.
If you have secrets as checks, you need to toggle that on manually as of right now.
TO-DO: Entrance rando logic and options, secrets option auto tracking.
